mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESOURCE_ENTERPRISE A WHERE RC_NO = 1 AND STATUS <> 'N' ORDER BY RSC_NO
SELECT * FROM RESOURCE_ENTERPRISE A WHERE RC_NO = 2 AND STATUS <> 'N' ORDER BY RSC_NO
SELECT * FROM RESOURCE_ENTERPRISE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RC_NO, RSC_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESOURCE_ENTERPRISE (RSC_NO, RC_NO, RSC_NAME, RSC_ETC, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_RSC.NEXTVAL, #{rcNo}, #{rscName}, #{rscEtc}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT A.REZ_NO , A.RSC_NO , A.REZ_WRITER , A.REZ_TITLE , A.START_TIME , A.END_TIME , A.STATUS , B.RSC_NAME , C.EMP_NAME FROM RESERVATION A JOIN RESOURCE_ENTERPRISE B ON A.RSC_NO = B.RSC_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON A.REZ_WRITER = C.EMP_NO WHERE A.STATUS != 'D'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (REZ_NO, RSC_NO, REZ_WRITER, REZ_TITLE, START_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{rscNo}, #{rezWriter}, #{rezTitle} , TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{startTime},'T',' '),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{endTime},'T',' '),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT A.REZ_NO , A.RSC_NO , A.REZ_WRITER , A.REZ_TITLE , TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME , TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TIME , A.STATUS , B.RSC_NAME FROM RESERVATION A JOIN RESOURCE_ENTERPRISE B ON A.RSC_NO = B.RSC_NO WHERE REZ_WRITER = #{empNo} ORDER BY A.START_TIME DESC
